alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 11:16PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CAMERON AND NORTHWESTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CST... At 1116 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gibbstown, or 7 miles northwest of Grand Chenier, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Klondike, Lowry, Creole, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, and Rutherford Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Upper Vermilion
